answers.answer: I would definitely suggest calling your doctor and letting them know what is going on - this isnt something you should ignore or try and treat on your own based on the advice of strangers on the internet.I dont know why you are on bedrest (what was causing the swelling) but if you have had problems w/ your blood pressure you need to call your doctor ASAP (or head to L and D).

title: severe pain that seems to be spreading
